```{r}
library(raster)
library(png)
library(mapview)
library(leaflet)
library(terra)
library(rgdal)
```

```{r}
png <- readPNG('./images/Bulk Manufacturing Area.png')

rst_blue <- raster(png[, , 1])
rst_green <- raster(png[, , 2])
rst_red <- raster(png[, , 3])

img <- brick(rst_red, rst_green, rst_blue)

floorplan <- leaflet(options = leafletOptions(minZoom = 9, maxZoom = 12))
m <- viewRGB(img, maxpixels =  950716)
  



floorplan
```

```{r}

png <- readPNG('./images/Bulk Manufacturing Area.png')

rst_blue <- raster(png[, , 1])
rst_green <- raster(png[, , 2])
rst_red <- raster(png[, , 3])

img <- brick(rst_red, rst_green, rst_blue)
pal <- colorNumeric(c("#0C2C84", "#41B6C4", "#FFFFCC"), values(img),
  na.color = "transparent")

leaflet() %>% addTiles() %>%
  addRasterImage(img, colors = pal, opacity = 0.8) %>%
  addLegend(pal = pal, values = values(img),
    title = "Surface temp")
```
